title: Neonatal goitre, not elsewhere classified
chapter: Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
block: Transitory endocrine and metabolic disorders specific to fetus and newborn
inclusion: conditions that have their origin in the perinatal period even though death or morbidity occurs later
transitory endocrine and metabolic disturbances caused by the infant's response to maternal endocrine and metabolic factors, or its adjustment to extrauterine existence
Transitory congenital goitre with normal function
exclusion: congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
congenital hypothyroidism with or without goitre
